name: Planned Bobsolescence
description:
The year is 2025. 

A popular company that produces automatic landing gear has placed an expiration date on their equipment, causing it to lock up to an unusable state after six months of use, regardless of prior condition. That expiration date has been reached, and there has been widespread disaster in its wake. 

Your duty is to land your plane without exploding.

Welcome to the world of Planned Obsolescence, Bob.
